biotools.summary: PCirc is a pipeline to predict plant circular RNA (CircRNA) which based on Python3. It can identify circRNA from a given RNA-seq data by high-throughput. The pipeline can alignment RNA_seq and extract features ,then based on Random Forest classification, the final circRNA will be predicted. The user only needs to run the python scripts step by step to get the predicted circular RNA.
